import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Form, Col, Button, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap' import Axios from 'axios' import '../App.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // import Axios from 'axios' const CreatePost = (props) => { const [user, setUser] = useState({})// user info const [postcreate , setCreatePost] = useState(false) // to show aleart //to add the input inside user let onChangeInput = ({ target: { name, value } }) => { setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } // to add the user info to database let onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData() formData.append('profileImg', this.state.profileImg) axios.post("http://localhost:4000/api/user-profile", formData, { }).then(res => { console.log(res) }) } return (
Title onChangeInput(e)} /> {/*
*/} Poster onChangeInput(e)} /> {/*
*/} Image onChangeInput(e)} /> {/*
*/} Overview onChangeInput(e)} /> Content
) } export default CreatePost;
